name: SCP-2521
description:
SCP-2521 (also known as ●●|●●●●●|●●|●) is a Keter-level SCP contained by SCP Foundation. SCP-2521 is a creature who steals every piece of information about itself, as long as the information is expressed in textual or verbal form. Because of that, everything about it is registered by ideograms and pictures.

SCP-2521 is a fangame based on the SCP Foundation. In this very short platformer game, you play as SCP-2521, navigating a couple quick little levels to get to the end. The catch? No text appears in-game.

The SCP Foundation Wiki, as well as the original SCP-2521 article, are used under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 3.0 license (CC-BY-SA).
